import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Inventario = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('productos'); const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ tipo: 'Ver todos', categoria: 'Ver todos', almacen: 'Ver todos', alertaStock: false }); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const tabs = [ { id: 'productos', label: 'Productos', active: true }, { id: 'compras', label: 'Compras', active: false }, { id: 'consumo', label: 'Consumo', active: false } ]; const handleTabClick = (tabId) => { setActiveTab(tabId); }; const handleFilterChange = (filterType, value) => { setFilters(prev => ({ ...prev, [filterType]: value })); }; return (
